name: PS-04-Voronoi Abstraction
description:
v4W.ENko - "PS-04-Voronoi Abstraction". The Black&White  representation of the standard "Voronoi"  pattern realized in 2d. "Pattern`s standardisation" series is a collection of patterns realized with standard algorithmic structures of typical 2d procedural geometry.  
The "Voronoi" diagram is used to generate the layer of white cells according to the reparametrisation of the "Substrate" pattern. "Voronoi" cells are transformed in real-time. The "radius" parameter of the "voronoi diagram" is changing the value during the process according to the addition "perlin wave" function. 
The whole visualizations is forming abstract motion image. 
500 cells / random seed 4888.  Packed as GIF. 1024*1024px / 180 frames.
